verses.roman:
kata-kṣaṇe dui janā susthira hañā
nānā iṣṭa-goṣṭhī kare ekatra vasiyā

synonyms: kata-kṣaṇe—after some time; dui—two; janā—people; su-sthira hañā—coming to their senses; nānā—various; iṣṭa-goṣṭhī—discussions; kare—do; ekatra—together; vasiyā—sitting.
translation: After some time they regained their senses and sat together to discuss various subjects.
